AuthenticationFooter.not_account: Do not have an account yet?

AutoimportTags.belonged_groups_not_found:
You do not belong to any group named {search}.
Try searching groups you are not joined.
AutoimportTags.title: Join Flickr group

ConfirmAccount.step1:
To confirm your account we need your Flickr ID. You can go to https://www.flickr.com/services/api/explore/flickr.people.getInfo and copy the value under 'Your user ID:'.
If you have any issue send us and email at info@skedr.io
ConfirmAccount.step2: We have sent you an email with a validation code. Please paste the code here to confirm your account. If you have not received in a few minutes check your spam folder.
ConfirmAccount.title: Confirm account

GroupTag.error: We could not fetch your data
GroupTag.no_data: We could not suggest tags. Press <kbd>Enter</kbd> to add one.
GroupTag.no_photos_found: You do not have photos with '{tag}' tag
GroupTag.not_enought_data_suggestion: Add more tags to your photos from this group
GroupTag.only_new_photos_hint1: Only your new photos from your photostream with the selected tags will be added. If you want to add all your current photos matching [{comboTags}] disable this option.
GroupTag.only_new_photos_hint2: All photos matching [{comboTags}] will be added. You can review which photos will be added below.
GroupTag.use_and_hint1: Search photos that contain all tags
GroupTag.use_and_hint2: Search photos that contain 1 or more tags
GroupTag.photo_limit:
This group will count toward the photos limit
(60 for Pro members, 30 for free members).
Ask the administrator to change this setting.
GroupTag.title: Manage Tags

Layout.no_photos_scheduled: You do not have any photo scheduled to share
Layout.photostream_empty: Your photostream is empty. Upload some photos in Flickr

Profile.not_subscribed: You are not subscribed to Skedr.io. Please consider supporting the project. We are offering a special discount for all early adopters. Benefit from a 50% discount on a monthly payment.
Profile.plan_info: Payment every {period} ({trialDays} days trial period)| Payment every {count} {period} ({trialDays} days trial period)
Profile.subscribed: Thanks for subscribing! Your support means a lot.
Profile.subtitle: Plan
Profile.title: Subscription
Profile.verify_email: Verify your email before submitting the payment

ResetPassword.message: We have sent you an email with a validation code. Please paste the code here to change your password. If you have not received in a few minutes check your spam folder.
ResetPassword.title: Reset password

ShareDialog.already_in_group: Photo is already in this group
ShareDialog.search_groups: Search groups to share your images
ShareDialog.selected_groups: no groups selected | 1 group selected | {count} groups selected
ShareDialog.shared_groups: Photo not shared in groups | Shared in 1 group | Shared in {count} groups

SignupUser.code_sent: Confirmation code has been successfully sent
SignupUser.step1_desc: First we need to connect to you Flickr account. Upon pressing Connect button you will  be redirected to your Flickr account to grant us access.
SignupUser.step3_desc: We have sent you an email with a validation code. Please paste the code here to validate your email. If you have not received it in a few minutes check your spam folder.
SignupUser.title: Create a Skedr.io account

UserProfile.code_sent: A code has been sent to your new email address. Confirm your new email address.
UserProfile.title: Profile

validation.incorrect_flickr_id: Incorrect Flickr ID. Should be like: 123456789@N01
validation.message: Use at least 8 characters. Include both lower and upper case letters, a number and a special character.
